pr_title: Switches to Docker to run RabbitMQ integration tests

timeline.message:
Switches to Docker to run RabbitMQ integration tests

I keep forgetting to run rabbitmq-server, sometimes forgetting where it is..
This makes it work provided docker works.

timeline.bodyText: inlining these tests saves 15s each on my laptop as the overall container bootstrap seems to have 15s overhead
